instruction: Give an example of an argument a robot might make for the following statement.
input: Robots can be used as more reliable and efficient replacements for human labor.
output: For example, automated robots can be programmed to accurately complete repetitive tasks with greater precision and at greater speeds than humans can. Additionally, robots require less maintenance and supervision than human labor and can work round-the-clock with no need for breaks. These advantages can result in reduced costs and improved productivity.
